pages.text: Vagrants, like any Assimilated version excluding, ironically, the Assimilated Adventurer, are capable of 'hiding' and perfectly emulating their prior human form.$(br2)$(#630000)I can do this with $(k:srpcotesia.togglehide).

In fact, a Vagrant's normal form resembles their previous very well, barring several major macabre alterations. This could explain why the process appears to be much faster than that of other Assimilated versions.$(br)This process appears to both incur and cannot be started during the Cooldown.

Parasites also tend to follow Vagrants of or above their $(l:vagrant/bloom)Tier$() that are not hiding, although they will prioritize attacking their current target or following a non-Vagrant parasite if they are already doing so.
